predicate.note: Frames file for 'despise' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet class despise 31.2, no mention of other members. Comparison to 'like'.

example.name: transitive, gnarly trace chains
example.text: The speed with which such program trades take place and the volatile price movements they can cause are what program trading critics profess to despise *trace*.
example.arg: *trace* -> what -> The speed with which such program trades take place and the volatile price movements they can cause
